name_japanese: はじめてのクリスマス
description: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name_japanese: 初めてのえいご・世界名作童話
description: Classical Folktales released on Japanese and English to teach Japanese children English.

name_japanese: 博多バスターミナル ブルース
description: A short theme song made by Takashi Taniguchi for the Hakata Bus Terminal in Fukuoka, Japan.

name_japanese: 博多バスターミナル吾郎
description: Absurd web series by Takashi Taniguchi for the Hakata Bus Terminal in Fukuoka, Japan.
Music video directed by ONIONSKIN for the song Hakken by sora tob sakana. The song is featured on their single "New Stranger".

name_japanese: はっけん たいけん だいすき! しまじろう
description: Second season of the Shimajirou children's television series.

name_japanese: はっきりことわろう 誘拐されないぞ！
description: An anime showing three common kidnapping scenarios for children to avoid so that they may protect themselves if it happens in real life.

name_japanese: ハコダテミュージカル
description:
WOW Inc.'s first architectural project: "Future Center Hakodate and Kids Plaza Hakodate" opened in Hakodate, Hokkaido on October 15, 2016. It opened as a regional exchange center after two and half years of cooperation with Sony PCL.

The large LED display "Media Wall" was requested by the city at the time of project planning, and it features various animations on display. Ryou Inoue was invited to create a musical opening for the Media Wall.

genres: Slice of Life, Comedy, Romance, School
description:
School Life of Hakusai and her friends.

Produced by Lamaze P (ラマーズP) in collaboration with Studio Piapro and broadcasted on Nico Nico.
A special of Hakusai Anime.

50 years have passed since the events of the original Hakushon Daimaou series. Akubi is training to become queen when she meets Kantarou Yodama, the grandson of the genie bottle's original owner, Kan-chan. Together, Akubi and Kantarou take on many jobs in the human world and learn the importance of having a dream.

The story follows a racoon-like tanuki creature named Hal who find an abandoned human baby. Hal names the baby Pal and decides to transform into a human mother to raise him.

(Source: ANN)
A music video for "Halfway" by Rayons.

name_japanese: ハレルヤ - 運命の選択 -
description:
The story is set in the ungoverned Tokyo shortly after a mysterious power outage incident. Those who survived from the incident had to protect themselves from the mob.

It was "Links," the young people with superpower, that saved the people in Tokyo. Among these young people, a performance group known as "Crown" gained tremendous support.

The protagonist Hallelujah and and his best friend Akatsuki, who grew up with him together in an orphanage, are also awakened with the abilities of Links. They join Crown and play an active part to save people every day.

(Source: Qoo News, edited)
No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.
A genie chef appears to fulfill the request of some children: making hamburger steaks for dinner!

Commercials/TV bumps for Dogatch's new mascot Hametarou. The second episode collaboration with Dogatch's other mascot franchise Mameshiba. The commercials are surreal pieces where Hametarou sings while thrusting his face through various cut outs.
Studio DLE and CoroCoro Comic have teamed up to create a series of absurd comedy shorts whose characters are based on reader questionnaires.
Music video for the song Hamigaki Ondo by Japanese singer TARAKO that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Hiroshi Nishimura.

Stop-motion animation using a hamster puppet. The anime usually has Sam singing, sometimes strumming his guitar, or dancing.

Note: It is unrelated to Hamster S.A.M. the US children's book series.
A shinobi sets out to rescue kidnapped rare animals.
Second season Han Hua Ri Ji.
Kenji Kawasaki's first film.
Spring is the season of encounters and farewells. The song was created in honor of Seiji Fujishiro's best friend who lost an important family member.

A music video adaptation of the classic Japanese children's game. The game is similar to the game Red Rover in the Western world. 

(Source: Wiki)

Animated versions of tales that won the Short Story Prize in the Hanaichi Monme bulletin, including Noboru and the Wildcat, The Misleading Friends, Sanma 's March, Red Mail-Box on the Mountain-Tot), and One Sunday Morning at the Beginning of May.

(Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

producers: TV Asahi, Tokyo Movie Shinsha, Mainichi Broadcasting System
description:
A wacky comedy about a man from a noble ancestry of long ago, but who in modern times is just a lowly salary man that is constantly being humiliated by his family and co-workers.

(Source: AniDB)

name_japanese: 花の魔法使いマリーベル フェニックスのかぎ
description: Mary Bell, Yuri, Ken, Ribbon, and Tambourine go to Flower Land to see Toto (the Phoenix) on his birthday.
Music video directed by Toshiaki Hanzaki for the single Hana no Nioi by Mr. Children.
Based on the Ninja Awate-maru comedy manga by Jirou Tsunoda.

name_japanese: 花のずんだ丸 じゃんく
description: Zundamaru is back... For now! Even without missions, we elite ninjas face grave dangers every day! (Anime Bancho)

Aya goes to mountain and meets a mountain witch, who tells her that when she does one good thing one flower comes out.

(Source: Amazon.com)
Yuji and Koichi set off on a journey to find a rare bamboo flower for a school project. In the forest they encounter a legendary phoenix who asks for their help to save the forest.
Story about Kappa with flowers on their heads.

name_english: Hanakappa Adventure in the Butterfly Kingdom
name_japanese: 映画 はなかっぱ 花さけ！パッカ～ん♪蝶の国の大冒険
description:
How annoying moms can be with all their lectures, but what happens if they are gone...? Mothers from the Yamabiko Village get kidnapped! Hanakappa and his friends leave their village and set out on a journey to save their mothers! Enduring a freezing mountain in winter and a blazing desert in summer, the kids head to a wonderland called "Butterfly Kingdom". Why were the mothers taken away? And who is this boy called Pol traveling with Hanakappa? What is his secret?

(Source: GAGA International)

name_japanese: はなかっぱの交通安全　ケーキを求めて右・左・右
description: An educational film about traffic safety staring Hanakappa.
An educational film about traffic safety staring Hanamaru.
Music video for the song Hanasaka Nyanko by Hiroko Taniyama that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Gaku Kinoshita.

name_japanese: 花さか天使テンテンくん
description: A foolish clumsy angel came to the human world to help a very unlucky boy. But more accidents are then created...
No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

name_japanese: ハンギョドンの００７／２ (ドクターサンデーあらわるの巻)
description: Hangyodon parodies James Bond/spy movies.

name_english: Hangyodon in the Emperor's New Clothes
name_japanese: ハンギョドンのはだかの王様
description: Hangyodon recreates the story of The Emperor's New Clothes.

name_japanese: ハンギョドンのパラレル大作戦 (花のお江戸は大さわぎ)
description: Hangyodon has an adventure during the old Edo period.

name_japanese: ハンギョドンのパラレル大作戦 恐竜王国は大さわぎ
description: Hangyodon and co. end up getting sent back to the past through a time machine and learn about dinosaurs.

name_japanese: ハンギョドンのパラレル大作戦 未来世界は大さわぎ
description: Hangyodon and co. end up getting sent the future and getting in a fight with aliens.
Shown daily during the Super J Channel news programme.
A film by Keiichi Tanaami.

name_japanese: 阪神淡路大震災に学ぶ 僕は、あの日を忘れない。
description: An educational film about the Great Hanshin earthquake (aka Kobe earthquake).

name_japanese: Happening Star ☆ (ハプニングスター☆)
description:
The science-fiction adventure story takes place 46 million light years away from Earth in the Sombrero Galaxy on a planet named Milky. The alien boy Kid, who refers to himself as Space's #1 Pilot, uses a Power Crystal to modify his spaceship and travel through dimensions. 

(Source: ANN)
Short film series by Takashi Kurihara.
